name: Beehazard
description:
This is the first project I do for a Jam

Enter the mansion and find the secrets of why bees are attacking people!

I couldn't finish the ideas I have, so expect the game to be sort, You can use controller too, Linux version has not been tested.

Controls:

AWSD : Movement

E: Interact

Q: Pass text

Tab: Inventory

Esc: Pause Menu
